MySolutions.Title: My $t(Solution_plural)
MySolutions.WelcomeMessage: $t(Authentication.Greeting). Here you can add a new $t(Solution) and manage all your $t(Solution_plural) — both those in progress and published.

Onboarding.Title: Onboarding in Progress
Onboarding.NoneFound: You don’t have any $t(Solution_plural) in progress. Add a new $t(Solution) to get started.

Published.Title: Published
Published.NoneFound: You don’t have any published $t(Solution_plural). Once you have completed all four stages of Adding a $t(Solution), your published $t(Solution_plural) will show here.

BannerSection.Title: Introducing the NHS Store
BannerSection.Subtitle: More choices, better patient outcomes
BannerSection.Information: IT Suppliers may now apply to sell to the NHS from our store.

AboutSection.Title: About Us
AboutSection.Information: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Cards.title: GP IT Futures Framework
Cards.info: View terms and details in Bravo.

Cards.title: Capabilities & Standards
Cards.info: View the model and new requirements.

Cards.title: My Solutions
Cards.info: Suppliers can log in to add new Solutions and manage all Solutions.

Steps.info: Provide basic details and select Capabilities
Provide evidence for your Solution's Capabilities
Provide evidence for your Solution's Standards
Build your Solution Page (What Buyers will see)

Subtitle.New: Start with Stage 1 to register your $t(Solution) and build the requirements for the next two stages.

StartingCallout.Title: Before you start
StartingCallout.Text: We recommend you read the Supplier Guide. It contains helpful detail and guidance to make your journey as swift and easy as possible.

Stages.Name: $t(Solution) Registration
Stages.Title: Provide basic details and select $t(Capability_plural)
Stages.Narrative: Provide $t(Solution) name, description, version and contact details. Select the $t(Capability_plural) that describe what your $t(Solution) does to build the requirements for the next two stages.

Stages.Name: $t(Capabilities Assessment)
Stages.Title: Provide evidence for your $t(Solution_possessive) $t(Capability_plural)
Stages.Narrative: Provide evidence that shows how your $t(Solution) meets each of its $t(Capability_plural). Your $t(Solution) will be assessed to ensure it meets the $t(Capability_plural) asserted.

Stages.Name: $t(Standards Compliance)
Stages.Title: Provide evidence for your $t(Solution_possessive) $t(Standard_plural)
Stages.Narrative: Provide evidence that shows how your $t(Solution) meets each $t(Standard_possessive) requirements. Your $t(Solution) will be evaluated for $t(Compliance) with each $t(Standard).

Stages.Name: $t(Solution) Detail
Stages.Title: Build your $t(Solution) page
Stages.Narrative: Provide information to help buyers evaluate your $t(Solution). This information will be moderated. It not affect either $t(Assessment) (Stage 2) or $t(Compliance) (Stage 3).

Help.Title: Help - Where can I find guidance on $t(Onboarding.Title)?
Text: Follow the links below for guidance on each stage of $t(Onboarding.Title).

• Stage 1 - $t(Onboarding.Stages.0.Name)
  • Stage 2 - $t(Onboarding.Stages.1.Name)
  • Stage 1 - $t(Onboarding.Stages.0.Name)
  • $t(Solution) page (what buyers will see)

RegistrationCompleteCallout.Title: $t(Solution) registration complete.
Text: You can now continue with stage 2 $t(Onboarding.Stages.1.Name) as soon as you’re ready.
You can view stage 3, and start saving evidence against $t(Standard_plural_possessive) requirements. However, you cannot submit evidence for stage 3 until you have passed stage 2.

Details.Title: Enter $t(Solution) details and key contacts.
Details.Subtitle: Provide basic information and key contacts for your $t(Solution) below.
Details.Preamble: This information will be shared with $t(NHSD.Name) to identify your $t(Solution) and enable communication. You can edit this information until you submit evidence for $t(Capability Assessment) in stage 2.

NameDescVersion.Preamble: ‘$t(Solution) name’ ‘Description’ and ‘Version’ will be sent to $t(NHSD.Name) to identify your $t(Solution). They will also be shown to buyers at the conclusion of onboarding.

Description.Label: Summary description *
Description.Info: Your Summary description will be displayed on your $t(Solution) page and in search results, but it will not affect search ranking or $t(Capabilities Assessment). You can edit this later.

Help.Title: Help - What is Version?
Text: $t(Solution) version is a numbering system used to distinguish between instances or releases of a particular $t(Solution). Here, $t(Solution) version is intended to be used when new $t(Solution_plural) are released with significant feature developments. In other words, when the ‘major number’ has changed, in $t(Standard) semantic versioning schemes.
For example, a new version number could describe a new release that has expanded functionality or different $t(Capability_plural) from a previous version.

LeadContact.Preamble: The Lead Contact is responsible for ensuring the accuracy of information provided. This contact will receive an invitation to register and all this $t(Solution)’s email notifications. All contact information subject to $t(NHSD.Name)’s privacy policy.

AddContact.Help: Some organisations work with multiple people in similar roles. Please add any additional $t(Solution) contacts, as relevant.

Capabilities.Title: Which $t(Capability_plural) does your $t(Solution) provide?*
Capabilities.Subtitle: Select all that apply to build the requirements for the next two stages.
Preamble: You may change your $t(Capability) selections until you have submitted responses for assessment in Stage 2.
Asserted $t(Capability_plural) will be shown to the public on your $t(Solution) page once you’ve complete all four stages of Adding a $t(Solution).

Help.Title: Help - What are $t(Capability_plural)?
Text: Some $t(Standard_plural) are associated with $t(Capability_plural). Others are overarching and required for all $t(Solution_plural). $t(Standard_plural) contain requirements your $t(Solution) must meet to provide a minimum level of quality.
Learn more and view all $t(Standards and Capabilities).

Reveal.FullDescriptionLinkText: See $t(Capability) detail and Associated $t(Standard_plural) in Confluence
Reveal.CompliancePreamble: To meet this $t(Capability), you must comply with these Associated $t(Standard_plural).

Selection.Preamble: By selecting this $t(Capability), you are acknowledging the set of $t(Standard_plural) your $t(Solution) must meet to attain compliance.

Overarching.Heading: Overarching $t(Standard_plural) — These are required for all $t(Solution_plural)

Associated.Heading: Associated $t(Standard_plural) — These are related to the $t(Capability_plural) selected.

Dashboard.Title: $t(Standard_plural) Dashboard
Dashboard.Subtitle: Your $t(Solution) must comply with all of the $t(Standard_plural) below in order to be available for purchasing from the $t(Catalogue.Title). You may submit the evidence for one $t(Standard) at a time. Click on each $t(Standard) to see and submit requirements for that $t(Standard).

Help.Title: Help - What are $t(Associated Standards)?
Help.Text: $t(Associated Standards) relate to one or more of the $t(Capability_plural) selected. They include $t(Capability)-Specific $t(Standard_plural) and Context-Specific $t(Standard_plural).

Help.Title: Help - What are $t(Overarching Standards)?
Help.Text: $t(Overarching Standards) contain requirements that apply to all $t(Solution_plural). They relate to the $t(Solution) as a whole.

Submitted.Heading: $t(Standard) $t(Compliance) Evidence submitted.
Narrative: Your evidence for {{name}} has been submitted to $t(NHSD.Name). You can expect to receive a reply within 5 working days.
While your submission is being reviewed, you are free to keep working on gathering and submitting evidence for the remaining $t(Standard_plural).

Evidence.Subtitle: Detailed instructions are included in the $t(Traceability Matrix) from the $t(Assessment team) below. Download the file. Complete the requirements in the file and upload it. ‘$t(CompliancePages.Evidence.Buttons.Submit)’ to send it to $t(NHSD.Name) for evaluation.
Preamble: For support, see guidance for this stage. If this $t(Solution) is published, buyers can request the final version of the evidence you submit in the $t(Traceability Matrix).
For Clarifications and other queries, email us.

CurrentFile.Heading: Download current file
Missing: Please wait for the $t(Standards Compliance) team to provide you with a $t(Traceability Matrix).
We will email the lead contact when this stage is ready.

Message.Label: Message (optional)
Message.Help: Include a message with your file. For example, you can use this field to describe changes between submission versions.

History.Heading: Submission History
History.HasFeedback: Status: Feedback available. See response below.

Confirmation.Heading: Review and submit before you send to $t(NHSD.Name).
Confirmation.Information: Review and edit as needed. This is your last chance to make changes before submitting this $t(Standard) to $t(NHSD.Name) for review.

Help.Title: Help - What happens next?
Help.Information: When you Submit this page, the information you have provided will be sent to $t(NHSD.Name), and the $t(Compliance) team will begin reviewing your responses in the Traceability Matrix file you’ve provided. Your Lead Contact and designated $t(Standard) Owner (if there is one) will receive a notification linked to the outcome once the review is complete.

File.Heading: File
File.NotFound: A File was not found, please refresh the page or try and re-upload.

Message.Heading: Message (Optional)
Message.NotFound: No message was provided with this file.

Assessment.Title: Provide Assessment evidence for your $t(Solution).
Assessment.Instructions: Provide primary evidence for each $t(Capability) below. Once you have completed the required fields, review your answers on the next page before submitting them to $t(NHSD.Name).
Assessment.Guidance: For support, see guidance for this stage, and watch the example demonstration video. If this $t(Solution) is published, buyers can request the information you provide on this page. All Clarifications should be submitted in Bravo.

Evidence.Instructions: Choose to provide a video, or give a live witness demonstration, to show how your $t(Solution) meets this Capability. Find further instructions, along with all Epics and Acceptance Criteria in Confluence: Document Management Capability.
Evidence.Title: Add primary evidence for this Capability.*

Options.Question: Do you want to provide a recorded video demonstration or schedule a live witness demonstration?

Video.Title: 1. Add video file and describe epics (required)*
Video.Previous: The last file you uploaded was:
Video.Additional: Indicate which epics are demonstrated in the video, including the time where each epic is demonstrated. For example, Epic 3 at 4:56.

Notice.Title: $t(NHSD.Name) will contact you
Notice.Additional: $t(NHSD.Name) will contact your Lead Contact to schedule the live witness demonstration.

Submission.Notice: By Submitting this information to $t(NHSD.Name) for Assessment, you are confirming you are able, to the best of your knowledge, to meet all $t(Capability) Assessment and $t(Standard_plural) $t(Compliance) requirements and to display the $t(Solution) named on the NHS Catalogue.

Confirmation.Title: Review and submit your responses to $t(NHSD.Name).
Confirmation.Information: Review your answers and edit as needed. This is your last chance to make changes before submitting your $t(Solution) to $t(NHSD.Name) for Assessment.

Help.Title: Help - What happens next?
Help.Information: When you Submit this page, the information you have provided will be sent to $t(NHSD.Name), and the Assessment team will begin reviewing your responses for each Capability. Your Lead Contact will receive a notification linked to an Outcome letter once the assessment is complete.
